ComicInfo.Title: Of Gods and Men; A Distant Music!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Of Gods and Men: Sif tries to tell Thor she is returning to Asgard with or without him but one emergency after another prevent Thor from having time to listen to her.
A Distant Music!: Sif and Thor, in their secret identities attend the wedding of Jane Foster and Keith Kincaid. Afterward, Sif leaves Midgard to return to Asgard, leaving Thor behind.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:28:15. [Issue ID 37877]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
